pub.citation: Clement, W. L. et al. 2004. PHYLOGENETIC POSITION AND BIOGEOGRAPHY OF HILLEBRANDIA SANDWICENSIS (BEGONIACEAE): A RARE HAWAIIAN RELICT. American Journal of Botany 91(6): 905-917.

pmmd.notes: Maximum parsimony tree for Cucurbitales based on analysis of combined data from chloroplast rbcL and nuclear 18S rDNA sequences. Strict consensus of six trees of 990 steps; consistency index (CI) 5 0.4972 (excluding uninformative characters), retention index (RI) 5 0.5028, rescaled consistency index (RC) 5 0.4605. Family affiliations are shown to the right of taxon names. Percentages above the branches are bootstrap values; numbers preceded by below the branches are decay values. An asterisk indicates a taxon for which only rbcL data was included in the analysis.
